function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Privacy concerns related to the use of drone technology","Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data","Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","Hazardous exposure to disinfectant chemicals due to drone spraying","Risk of technological failure leading to delay in delivery of medical supplies","Vulnerabilities in drone operations, such as gps jamming and hacking, make drones an attractive prospect for malicious users to conduct cyberterrorism and other unlawful activities","Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it","High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment","Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","Reliance on wearables for health monitoring may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare practices and face-to-face medical consultations, resulting in delayed or inadequate medical care for non-covid-19 related conditions","Wearable devices collecting and transmitting health data may pose privacy and security risks, potentially leading to unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive personal information","Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","Privacy concerns surrounding the use of gps technology could lead to public distrust and reluctance to use the app","Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening","Privacy concerns related to ai for crowd surveillance, leading to fear and distrust among the public","Contagious diseases may spread through the use of telemedicine platforms","Potential transmission of infectious diseases through shared medical imaging devices","Privacy and ethical concerns related to the use of surveillance and data collection by patrol robots","Rapid global spread of covid-19","Passive reporting method leading to omission of reports"]}
